about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, L.K. Mehta Polymers Limited is engaged in trading and manufacturing of Plastic products.

The company is also involved in trading and reprocessing basic raw materials like polypropylene and polyethylene granules for various customers.

The company sells products under the brand name "Super Pack," reflecting its commitment to superior quality and building lasting customer relationships.

The company has strict systems to ensure timely delivery and minimal errors, with procedures to check orders at each stage, focusing on consistent service and customer loyalty.

Product Portfolio:

  • Ropes: Monofilament Ropes, Danline Ropes, Tape Rope, these products are used in non-ISI applications like transportation, agriculture, and packaging, as well as in high-risk sectors like shipping, mining, and heavy machinery transport.
  • Twines: Baler Twine, Packaging wine(Sutli), these are usually used in Agriculture, Harvesting, Stationary, Handicraft Industry, Retail packaging of consumer goods, household use.
  • Granuels: Polyethylene, Polypropylene, For reprocessing and manufacturing of plastic products.

As on 25th January, 2025, the company has 21 full time employees.

Competitive Strength:

  • Experienced Promoters
  • Generational Management
  • Quality Service
  • High Level of Customer Satisfaction
  • Existing Client Relationship

faqs.question: What is the L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer:
L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO is a SME IPO of 1040000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.38 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹71 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on February 13, 2025, and closes on February 17, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO opens on February 13, 2025 and closes on February 17, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer: L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,13,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO will be done on Tuesday, February 18, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 20, 2025. Check the L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The L.K. Mehta Polymers IPO listing date is on Friday, February 21, 2025.
